bond.name: Snow White > Witch Ravenna
bond.value: Increases Witch Ravenna's DMG dealt by 8%.

bond.name: Witch Ravenna > Snow White
bond.value: Increases Snow White's DMG dealt by 10%.

skill.name: Poison Apple Temptation
skill.value: Deals 4962/5922 DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK. Target deals 45%/53% less DMG for a limited time.

ability.name: Beautiful Princess (Lv. 50)
ability.value: Moderately reduces DMG taken and restores 2.5% HP every 5 seconds.

ability.name: Beautiful Witch (Lv. 78)
ability.value: Normal attacks have a moderate chance of inflicting Silence.
